content:
The head of the Kherson Regional Military Administration, Alexander Proudin, showed a video of the consequences of shelling of Kherson's shipwreck, carried out by the Russians this day.

He is appropriatePublishedon your Facebook page.

The Russian measure went around Kherson again. In the afternoon, the invaders fired the ship's district. A 45-year-old woman was injured in her own yard. She has a leg injury, ”his post reads.

He added that the children miraculously remained alive, because the house was quite cut.

According to Alexander Proudin, children's toys are littered with glass - this look now has a house that has fallen under a hostile blow.

As reported by the Armyinform, the number of victims in Kharkiv region through the shelling of the Russian Federationhas grownup to seven people.
title: Kherson showed the consequences of today's shelling of the ship district
description: He posted the relevant footage on his Facebook page. "Russian measure" again ...
author: Army Inform
